qas.question: Who normally manages a construction job?
Who normally supervises a construction job?

answers.text: a construction manager, design engineer, construction engineer or project manager
construction manager, design engineer, construction engineer or project manager

qas.question: What is essential for the successful execution of a project?
The largest construction projects are known as what?
Zoning requirements, environmental impact, budgeting, and logistics are things who should consider?

answers.text: Those involved with the design and execution of the infrastructure
Those involved with the design and execution of the infrastructure
Those involved with the design and execution of the infrastructure in question

qas.question: What is primarily and independent effort?
What does a constuction engineer manage?

plausible_answers.text: zoning requirements, the environmental impact of the job,

qas.question: What is seldom considered by those involved with the design and execution of infatructure?
What requires collaboration across zoning requirements?
Who normally manages the environmental impact of the job?

plausible_answers.text: a construction manager, design engineer, construction engineer or project manager

qas.question: Who normally supervises inconvenience to the public?
What is the largest infrastructure in question referred to?

For the successful execution of a project, <a2_0><a2_1><a2_2><b13_0>effective planning<b13_0/><a2_2/><a2_1/><a2_0/> is essential. <a4_0><a4_1><a4_2>Those involved with the design and execution of the infrastructure<a4_1/><a4_0/> in question<a4_2/> must consider <b8_0>zoning requirements, the environmental impact of the job,<b8_0/> the successful scheduling, budgeting, construction-site safety, availability and transportation of building materials, logistics, inconvenience to the public caused by construction delays and bidding, etc. The largest construction projects are referred to as <a3_0><a3_1><a3_2><b7_0><b12_0>megaprojects<b12_0/><a3_2/><a3_1/><a3_0/>.
